idea:
DEBURRING INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED is India’s top manufacturer, exporter and manufacturers’ representative,offering a wide range of industrial abrasive products for deburring and super finishing needs . Our highspeed,

high-intensity finishing processes for hands-free deburring ensure improved part performance and durability. In addition, Deburring India delivers customized solutions backed up by innovation and

technical know-how. Our ability to find the perfect brush with advanced technology for even the most

complex and complicated applications makes us a preferred partner for glocal clients.Over the years, Deburring India has exceeded the expectations of national and international clients with the value addition of technical support and industry know-how. Our deburring solutions support various small to heavy industries like automobile, aviation,aeronautical, oil & gas, defence, marine & ship building, ordnance, turbine, engineering and many more.The Quality Makes the Difference at Deburring India.Powered by a team that focuses on constant innovation for cost-effective solutions, we’re able to offer low CPC (cost per component) and high value in all our deliverables.
name: DEBURRING INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Akshar Fee Management Solutions Pvt Ltd is a new age IT and financial technology company that aims to redefine fee payments and educational loans through unprecedented speed and ease. It ensures that no institute faces any shortage of funding due to delay in collection of fees. It offers low cost credit facility to the parents in a fully digital manner to help them pay the fees of their wards in timely manner and thus help the educational institute to overcome issue of shortage of funds to run the institute.
name: AKSHAR FEE MANAGEMENT SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are a manufacturing company engaged in manufacturing High Fashion Ladies Garments under the upcoming brand name of CHANTELLE. Our aim is to make garments ergonomically eco skin friendly and easy to wear. We are working on to use organic fabrics with latest fashion in reasonable price.
name: CHANTELLE FASHION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: EDENCE LIFE SCIENCES PRIVATE LIMITED is a pure-play Nutraceutical Company, born out of a long-term vision and passion. We began our journey in the food ingredient space with Kancor Ingredients, pioneers in bringing state-of-the-art technologies in India for extraction of key ingredients from their natural sources which are widely used in food & flavouring industries.
name: EDENCE LIFE SCIENCES PRIVATE LIMITED
